siteMetadata.title: Life with a Twist of Lemon

node.excerpt: Dear Financially Minded Listener, Thanks for tuning in for Episode 8! This week Jon met his mortgage savings goal so he seeks advice from the most experienced guy he knows - Stan Lemon (who has gone through the process 6 times.) Stan drops some knowledge and points out some…

frontmatter.title: Episode 8 - If you don't buy milkshakes with your money, save for a house!

node.excerpt:
Stan switched web browsers for the day, so he and Jon kick off the episode talking about that. That leads into office type suites, to financial apps to budgeting. Listen in to a typical conversation of Stan Lemon and Jon Kohlmeier.
.mp3/twistoflemonpod.s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com…

frontmatter.title: Episode 3 - Web Browsers, Word Processors, and Budgeting
